properties.Name: Tantra / B Funky Stage
properties.description: The Tantra/B Funky Electronic Dance Music Stage is a DJ showcase for the thriving dance community of San Francisco. Brought to you by the same people who have rocked Pink Saturday, Castro Halloween, Lovefest SF, Burning Man and How Weird, The Tantra/B Funky stage will take dancers through an afternoon of Trance, House, Future Swing, Mashups & more! With headliners like Donald Glaude, Khromata, SpekrFreks, & tons more! Dance loud and proud in the streets of San Francisco! Find us at Van Ness Ave & Golden Gate Ave.

properties.Name: A&PI Pride Pavilion & Community Stage
properties.description: The A&PI LGBTQ Community Pride Stage 2019 is now on its 19th year of offering the best A&PI LGBTQI performers on one dynamic stage presentation. Over 15 amazing performing acts, deejays, artists and lots of dancing on the street! Hosted by Community Icon, Tita Aida, Drag Sensation, Estee Longah and other API LGBTQI celebrities and personalities. Check our SF Community Health Center ‘s Programs and Wellness Clinic plus HIV Testing and other services at the Pavilion.  For more info, www.sfcommunityhealth.org

properties.Name: INDIE OASIS Stage
properties.description: For numerous years, Indie Oasis has been your dance destination for SF Pride! Featuring Indie, Remixes, Electro and Hard Dance! Prepare your shoes to hit the pavement in celebration of Love, Equality & Queers of all colors/ages/sexualities/abilities and genders, through music and dance all day. Featuring several of the best loved Bay Area DJs! Sponsored by Cat Club and Fringe, SF.

properties.Name: Sundance Country Western Dance Corral
properties.description: Sundance Saloon presents two-stepping and line dancing at the Sundance Country-Western Dance Corral. Drop by and soak in the festive vibe. Kick up your heels with easy line dance lessons at 2:00, 3:00 and 4:00. If you have two left feet, bring those, too! For more information, visit www.sundancesaloon.org.

properties.Name: Leather Alley
properties.description: Interested in kink? Leather Alley envisions community and education simultaneously. Leather Alley is for those interested in or curious about Leather, BDSM, kink, and fetish. Leather Alley offers an opportunity to see demos and chat with experienced scene members, to learn about community organizations, and to foster friendship and family in a safe and supportive environment. Leather Alley also provides an environment for people to hang out and relax after the San Francisco Pride March with others from the kink/leather/fetish community. You must be 18+ to visit Leather Alley.

properties.Name: Homo Hip Hop
properties.description: Homo Hip Hop Stage produced by DJ Rapture and Get Ur Life Productions is excited to be a part of the celebration. And ready to provide an exciting event that showcases the incredible talent in the community, provides an unforgettable party experience for our patrons, all while promoting peace, unity, and safety.

properties.Name: Women's Stage
properties.description: Proudly announcing SHOWTIME® as the presenting sponsor of the 2019 SF Pride Women’s Stage! Celebrate love, diversity and pride at the Women’s Stage! Located at McCallister and Leavenworth, indulge in 7 hours of stage performances by musicians, dancers, singers and DJs!

properties.Name: Sober Stage
properties.description: The Castro Country Club’s Sober Stage is a drug and alcohol-free zone with entertainment and fun for all. Bring a blanket, picnic, and settle in for a day of celebration, with Live Music, DJs, and performances; something for everyone.

properties.Name: The OFC LGBTQ Family Garden
properties.description: Our Family Coalition is thrilled to offer the Family Garden once again on Sunday from 11am-4pm. This is a safe, fun space for children, youth, and their LGBTQ parents/caregivers during the Pride celebration. Arts and crafts, games, face painting, and resources will be offered to LGBTQ families. Come see old friends and meet new ones. It will be a blast for all, so be sure to stop by and check it out! The Family Garden is a smoke and alcohol-free space. Questions? Contact jeannette@ourfamily.org.
